name: Assault Rifle
description:
Mows down enemies with overwhelming force.
It excels at rapid-fire and is well suited to taking down powerful foes.

name: Stone Axe
description:
An axe for cutting wood.
Made from stone, it's not very sharp.

name: Metal Axe
description:
An axe for cutting wood.
Made from metal, its sharpness has improved.

name: Refined Metal Axe
description:
An axe for cutting wood.
Made from high quality metal, its sharpness has improved even further.

name: Metal Detector
description:
Holding it allows you to detect hidden ores nearby.
It marks the metal when close to the ore, but the mark disappears if you move away.

name: Wooden Club
description:
A Wooden Club for close range combat.
Can beat a small Pal to a pulp if need be.

name: Bat
description:
Baseball bat for close-range combat.
Might be tough to get a home run with a Pal.

name: Meat Cleaver
description:
Knife for butchering Pals.
When equipped, the Pet command becomes Butcher.
Butchered Pals will be gone for good.

name: Stun Baton
description:
Close range weapon that sends out an electric jolt upon contact.
Pals are easier to capture when electrocuted.

name: Crossbow
description:
Fires an Arrow effortlessly.
Though it takes time to load, it delivers a powerful shot.

name: Double-Barreled Shotgun
description:
Wreaks havoc at close range. Can fire twice before reloading.
Despite the limited load capacity, it still packs a punch.

name: Handgun
description:
A handgun with improved capacity and rapid-fire capabilities.
Has more immediate firepower than a Makeshift Handgun.

name: Decal Gun 1
description:
Strange gun that paints a picture of Cattiva where it is fired.
Have some fun and paint the walls or ceilings!

name: Decal Gun 2
description:
Strange gun that paints a picture of Lamball where it is fired.
Have some fun and paint the walls or ceilings!

name: Decal Gun 3
description:
Strange gun that paints a picture of Melpaca where it is fired.
Have some fun and paint the walls or ceilings!

name: Decal Gun 4
description:
Strange gun that paints a picture of Anubis where it is fired.
Have some fun and paint the walls or ceilings!

name: Decal Gun 5
description:
Strange gun that paints a picture of Relaxaurus where it is fired.
Have some fun and paint the walls or ceilings!

name: Homing Sphere Launcher
description:
A launcher for firing spheres.
Fired spheres home in on Pals.

name: Laser Rifle
description:
A weapon that fires high-energy lasers.
It has impressive firepower and is easy to handle.

name: Rocket Launcher
description:
A Rocket Launcher 
that can fire a powerful round from long distances.

name: Stone Pickaxe
description:
A pickaxe used for mining.
Made from stone, the efficiency is questionable.

name: Metal Pickaxe
description:
A pickaxe used for mining.
Made from metal, its durability and efficiency have improved.

name: Refined Metal Pickaxe
description:
A pickaxe used for mining.
Its durability and efficiency have further improved.

name: Pump-Action Shotgun
description:
A high capacity, powerful shotgun.
It has outstanding close range DPS.

name: Single-Shot Rifle
description:
A single-shot rifle. Takes time to load.
What it lacks in capacity, it makes up for with sheer power.

name: Scatter Sphere Launcher
description:
A new type of launcher that fires a large number of spheres.
It can easily capture a herd of Pals.

name: Single-Shot Sphere Launcher
description:
A launcher that fires spheres.
It can capture Pals fom a greater distance.

name: Sword
description:
Sword for close-range combat.
The blade is extremely sharp! Mightier than a pen, for sure.
Requires Weapon Workbench to craft.

name: Frag Grenade
description:
A Frag Grenade useful for mid-range combat.
It detonates a few seconds after being thrown, dealing damage to enemies.

name: Incendiary Grenade
description:
A Incendiary Grenade useful for mid-range combat.
It detonates a few seconds after being thrown, setting the surrounding area on fire.

name: Shock Grenade
description:
A Shock Grenade useful for mid-range combat.
It detonates a few seconds after being thrown, electrocuting everything in the blast radius.

name: Ice Grenade
description:
A Ice Grenade useful for mid-range combat.
It detonates a few seconds after being thrown, freezing the surrounding area.

name: Old Bow
description:
Primitive long range weapon.
Hastily put together, it isn't very powerful.

name: Poison Bow
description:
Frightening bow that poisons its target.
Poisoned Pals are easier to capture.
Requires Poison Arrow.

name: Fire Bow
description:
A bow that deals Fire damage.
Burns Pals with fire arrows, making them easier to capture.
Requires Fire Arrow.

name: Poison Arrow Crossbow
description:
A Crossbow that inflicts poison on its target.
Poisoned Pals are easier to capture.
Requires Poison Arrow.

name: Fire Arrow Crossbow
description:
A Crossbow that deals Fire damage.
Burns Pals with fire arrows, making them easier to capture.
Requires Fire Arrow.

name: Three Shot Bow
description:
An enhanced bow that allows three arrows to be fired simultaneously.
By some strange mechanism, it only consumes a single Arrow when fired.

name: Hand-Held Torch
description:
Lights up dark areas and keeps you warm.
Can also be used for close range combat in a pinch.

name: Makeshift Handgun
description:
A handgun created from spare parts.
Relatively well suited for close quarters combat, but can only fire one shot before needing to reload.

name: Stone Spear
description:
Useful for close-range combat.
Its length allows you to stand further away when attacking.

name: Metal Spear
description:
Useful for close-range combat.
The metal tip give it an increased attack power.
Its length allows you to stand further away when attacking.

name: Refined Metal Spear
description:
Useful for close-range combat.
The high-quality metal tip give it an increased attack power.
Its length allows you to stand further away when attacking.

name: Elizabee's Staff
description:
A spear made from Elizabee's staff, altered for human use.
It is imbued with Elizabee's indomitable spirit.

name: Lily's Spear
description:
The spear cherished by Lily.
Punishes those who neglect their Pals.

name: Grappling Gun
description:
It fires a hook that latches on to distant targets, pulling the user's body towards the target.
It allows for easy movement between places with varying elevation.

name: Mega Grappling Gun
description:
It fires a hook that latches on to distant targets, pulling the user's body towards the target.
Since it's upgraded, it now has greater range.

name: Giga Grappling Gun
description:
It fires a hook that latches on to distant targets, pulling the user's body towards the target.
Using data from prototype versions, its capabilities have been further increased.

name: Hyper Grappling Gun
description:
It fires a hook that latches on to distant targets, pulling the user's body towards the target.
As a result of research, it has achieved overwhelming mobility.

name: Musket
description:
Simple, old fashioned gun. 
Fires a single, powerful shot at the expense of a long reload time.

name: Old Bow
description:
Primitive long range weapon.
Hastily put together, it isn't very powerful.

description:

name: Gatling Gun
description:
A Gatling Gun capable of rapid fire. 
Mows down enemies with suppressive fire.

name: Flamethrower
description:
Flamethrower that fires long-range flame.
Can set the enemy on fire.

name: Grenade Launcher
description:
Fires grenades that cause wide-ranging explosions.
Useful when dealing with a large number of enemies.

name: Guided Missile Launcher
description:
Fires missiles that automatically track and pursue enemies.
Missiles explode upon impact, causing damage over a wide area.

name: Multi Guided Missile Launcher
description:
A missile launcher that can hold multiple ammo at once.
Fires a series of missiles that automatically track and follow enemies.

name: Laser Gatling Gun
description:
A Gatling gun capable of rapidly firing lasers. 
Burns down enemies with suppressive beams.

name: Frag Grenade Mk2
description:
An improved frag grenade.
It explodes a few seconds after being thrown, dealing massive damage to enemies.

description:
A handgun created from spare parts.
Relatively well suited for close quarters combat, but can only fire one shot before needing to reload.

name: Meteor Launcher
description:
A phenomenal weapon that fires a meteor.
Upon striking its target, it creates an explosion similar to a meteorite impact.

name: Dark Grenade
description:
A Dark Grenade useful for mid-range combat.
It detonates a few seconds after being thrown, dealing Dark damage to enemies.

name: Dragon Grenade
description:
A Dragon Grenade useful for mid-range combat.
It detonates a few seconds after being thrown, dealing Dragon damage to enemies.

name: Ground Grenade
description:
A Ground Grenade useful for mid-range combat.
It detonates a few seconds after being thrown, dealing Ground damage to enemies.

name: Grass Grenade

A Grass Grenade useful for mid-range combat.
It detonates a few seconds after being thrown, dealing Grass damage to enemies.

name: Water Grenade
description:
A Water Grenade useful for mid-range combat.
It detonates a few seconds after being thrown, dealing Water damage to enemies.

name: Katana
description:
Katana for close-range combat.
Slices through with razor-sharp precision, cutting cleanly in one strike.

name: Beam Sword
description:
Beam Sword for close-range combat.
Slices through opponents, burning them with a high-output laser.

name: Semi-Auto Shotgun
description:
A rapid-fire shotgun with immense power. 
Its close-range damage output is top-notch.

name: Plasma Cannon
description:
Fires high-output energy projectiles. 
Causes an energy explosion upon impact.

name: Poison Arrow Crossbow
description:
A Crossbow that inflicts poison on its target.
Poisoned Pals are easier to capture.
Requires Poison Arrow.

name: Old Revolver
description:
A slightly outdated revolving handgun. 
Compared to Handgun, it excels in single-shot power.

name: Pal Metal Pickaxe
description: A pickaxe for mining. It has achieved extraordinary efficiency thanks to Pal Metal.

name: Pal Metal Axe
description: An axe for chopping wood. It has achieved extraordinary sharpness thanks to Pal Metal.

name: Makeshift Assault Rifle
description:
An assault rifle handmade from scraps. 
It excels in rate of fire and long range, but its single-shot power is low.

name: Semi-Auto Rifle
description:
A rifle that allows for a certain degree of rapid fire. 
It’s easy to aim and has high firepower, making it effective for mid-range combat.

name: Makeshift SMG
description:
A submachine gun handmade from scraps. 
It excels in rate of fire, but its single-shot power is low.

name: SMG
description:
A submachine gun with exceptional rate of fire. 
It’s easy to handle and effective in close-range combat.

name: Makeshift Shotgun
description:
A shotgun handmade from scraps. 
It has a short range but excels in close-range combat

description:

According to the legend, this sword was brought back from a distant land by Croajiro.
